content: Hello Irfan! How can I assist you today? Do you have any health concerns or questions related to Ayurveda?
I am having severe cough and cold. Suggest me a medicine.
I recommend taking a teaspoon of honey mixed with a pinch of turmeric twice a day for your cough and cold symptoms.

I'm having cough and cold for four days. Give me a remedy.

I recommend taking a teaspoon of honey mixed with a pinch of turmeric twice a day for your cough and cold symptoms. Additionally, drink warm water with ginger and lemon throughout the day. If symptoms persist, consider consulting a healthcare professional.
